content: Entry for Singapore in ISO 3166-2 **ISO 3166-2:SG** is the entry for [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore) in [ISO 3166-2](/wiki/ISO_3166-2), part of the [ISO 3166](/wiki/ISO_3166) [standard](/wiki/Standardization) published by the [International Organization for Standardization](/wiki/International_Organization_for_Standardization) (ISO), which defines [codes](/wiki/Code) for the names of the principal [subdivisions](/wiki/Country_subdivision) (e.g., [provinces](/wiki/Province) or [states](/wiki/State_(administrative_division))) of all [countries](/wiki/Country) coded in [ISO 3166-1](/wiki/ISO_3166-1). Currently for Singapore, ISO 3166-2 codes are defined for [five districts](/wiki/Districts_of_Singapore). Each code consists of two parts separated by a hyphen. The first part is SG, the [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2](/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2) code of Singapore. The second part is two digits (01–05). ## Current codes Subdivision names are listed as in the ISO 3166-2 standard published by the ISO 3166 Maintenance Agency (ISO 3166/MA). *Click on the button in the header to sort each column.* CodeSubdivision name ([en](/wiki/English_language))Subdivision name ([ms](/wiki/Malay_language))Subdivision name ([zh](/wiki/Chinese_language))Subdivision name ([ta](/wiki/Tamil_language))SG-01[Central Singapore](/wiki/Central_Singapore_District)Pusat Singapura新加坡中部மத்திய சிங்கப்பூர்SG-02[North East](/wiki/North_East_District_(Singapore))Timur laut东北வடகிழக்குSG-03[North West](/wiki/North_West_District_(Singapore))Barat laut西北வடமேற்குSG-04[South East](/wiki/South_East_District_(Singapore))Tenggara东南தென்கிழக்குSG-05[South West](/wiki/South_West_District_(Singapore))Barat daya西南தென்மேற்குNotes ## Changes The following changes to the entry have been announced in newsletters by the ISO 3166/MA since the first publication of ISO 3166-2 in 1998: NewsletterDate issuedDescription of change in newsletterCode/Subdivision changeNewsletter I-92007-11-28Addition of administrative divisions and their codes**Subdivisions added:** 5 districts - [Subdivisions of Singapore](/wiki/Subdivisions_of_Singapore) - ISO Online Browsing Platform: SG - Districts of Singapore, Statoids.com
title: ISO 3166-2:SG
